mapper.select: SELECT pt.tname, pt.tno, pt.refno, pp.pno, pp.pname, (pt.sdate-pp.sdate) sdate, (pt.edate-pp.sdate) edate, (pt.prog/100) prog, pem.name name FROM PMSPROJECT pp, PMSTASK pt, (SELECT * FROM PMSEMP pe, PMSMEMBER pm WHERE pe.eno = pm.mno) pem WHERE pp.pno = pt.pno AND pt.mno = pem.mno START WITH pt.refno=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR pt.tno = pt.refno
